text: All supplies to #StColumb #TR8 #9 have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut  Siân
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Torrington #EX38 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
All customers affected by the #powercut in #CF64 #Penarth now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Siân
We are aware that properties are without power in #CF64 Penarth area. We aim to restore all supplies by 21:30.  Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #StColumb #TR8 #TR9 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 19:30. Andi

Apologies for the delay in restoring power due to the #powercut  We've got most supplies back on in #Torrington #EX38, but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 19:30.  Siân.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Torrington #EX38 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 16:00. Andi
All customers affected by the #powercut in the #Grantham #NG31 area now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Andi.
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Sleaford #NG34 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Drew
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Grantham #NG31 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 11:30. Andi
Apologies for the #powercut in #Sleaford #NG34 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 10:00. Drew
All supplies to #Caldicot #NP26 have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut Ellie
We are sorry about the #powercut in #Caldicot #NP26 & surrounding areas. Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 04:30. Ellie
Apologies for the #powercut in #Winchcombe #GL54 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 22:00. Drew
All supplies to #ST15 #Stoke have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Walsall #Dalaston #Willenhall #WS2 #WS10 #WV13 and surrounding areas are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut
Apologies for the ongoing #powercut affecting #Stoke #ST15 our engineers continue to work on repairing a high voltage cable, and are now estimating to have power restored by 20:30
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Pontypool #NP4 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut
Apologies for the #powercut in #Willenhall #WV13 #WS10 Darlaston & #Walsall #WS2 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 18:30. Drew
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Wellington #TA21 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Siân
